article_title: Biogen Has a Cure for Biotech Blues
article_text:
Apple, schmapple.

The real action in the stock market these days has been in biotechnology stocks such as Biogen Inc. Its shares have trounced those of the iPhone maker by 600 percentage points in the past three years.

Of course, investors in most other industries don’t have to deal with binary outcomes in the event of failure. Microsoft...

twitter.description: Jitters about Biogen’s current and future products may produce a rare buying opportunity in a hot sector.
twitter.creator: @spencerjakab
